text: Rıdvan Bolatlı (2 December 1928 – 31 March 2022) was a Turkish professional footballer. He played in Turkey for Ankaragücü. He was born in Ankara.Former National Football Player Rıdvan Bolatlı Died Bolatlı made six appearances for the Turkey national team from 1953 until 1954. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish footballers
title: Rıdvan Bolatlı
